message: I understand you want to split evenly, but consider the inflation affecting my share.  This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
Bob, I understand your position on the inflation. This offer is a compromise, taking that into account while still being fair to both of us.
Alice, this is the same offer you just presented, but accounting for the inflation we both know is happening. It's the fairest offer I can make.
Bob, it seems like we're at an impasse.  I'm sticking to my original offer of a 50/50 split.  It's the fairest option, regardless of how many rounds we go through.
